title: A Court of Broken Promises
description: The Kingdom of Adaria series begins with this slow-burn, why-choose, fantasy romance that promises to take you on a journey of growth, discovery, and intense love that will leave you on the edge of your seat!Kaia lived a life of privilege—until her father’s execution left her fleeing a vindictive king and council. Placing her trust in four unlikely heroes, Kaia must discover just how deep the truth has been buried in the Kingdom of Adaria — and why. For the sake of a desperate kingdom. Her own sake. And the sake of the men who sacrificed everything in order to protect her. But what happens when they find themselves tangled in a web of lies and deceit? One filled with secrets, betrayal, and... broken promises . A Court of Broken Promises is book one in the Kingdom of Adaria series. There is humor throughout but contains adult themes and situations. Intended for mature audiences. Please see the author's website for trigger warnings.
author: Bella Leigh Michaels
